title: Project-Based Experimental Lesson Design for Exploring Social Phenomena

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic social science concepts, experience using simple experimental tools
context.additional_context: Emphasis on inquiry-based activities in resource-constrained settings using smartphones and basic experimental tools

learning_goals: Students generate at least three open-ended questions to analyze causes and effects of social phenomena.
Learners collaboratively revise experimental designs and conduct at least two on-site investigations.
Participants convert data collection results into visual materials (infographics, etc.) for presentation.

resources: Basic Measurement Tools (Tape Measure, Thermometer, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
